summary:
Bigfoot, or Sasquatch, is a famous mythical creature in North American folklore. People describe it as a large, hairy, human-like being living in forests, especially in the Pacific Northwest. Despite many claimed sightings and supposed evidence like photos and footprints, scientists believe Bigfoot is a mix of folklore, mistakes, and hoaxes.

This legend has its roots in various sources, including European and indigenous folk tales of wild humanoids. Similar stories exist worldwide, reflecting a universal fascination with mysterious creatures in nature.
title: Bigfoot
